ValidationRule.description: If the CPA Indicator is Opt-In Partial Payment then the Funds paid shouls be less than the Total Copay
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator Full', ISPICKVAL(CPA_Indicator__c, "Opt-in - Partial payment"), CPA_Funds_Paid__c >= Total_Copay__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This value should be less than the “Total Copay” value
